title: Diary of an Evil Steve: There's a Herobrine in all of us [an unofficial Minecraft book]
description: Follow the amazing adventure of Steve gone bad!Spending too much time building alone in an offline world can do strange things to a person. Watch what happens as Steve goes through this and eventually snaps. What is he going to do? What's going to happen with him and the whole world?Find out in the Diary of Evil Steve! THIS BOOK IS NOT AN OFFICIAL MINECRAFT PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH MOJANG.
author: Crafty Nichole
